Summary: Went to the store and saw a strange red dot glowing in the sky
divs: Sighting DetailsI just came from from and notice I didnt have anything to eat in my house it was 10:24 when I left my house. I always look up in the sky at night since I take astronomy, so I know what stars Im nearby I by the lil dipper. So I look and I saw a strange red dot mix with gold light, it went in a slanted line, I yelled to who ever was near by and said "hey do you see that'? This guy asked what and I pointed to the sky and he and I just stared and said "oh sh*t" what is that? I thought it would be a shooting star but it didnt have a tail and I know that for a fact. Since it was a red dot going into a slanted direction, i could only think it was a UFO. I live over here in Queens Villiage by hempsted so the sky over here is clear. I was just shocked that I saw this last night
trends: There has been one other sighting in Jamaica
There were no other sightings in Jamaica on or around June 23rd 2012
